pr_title: Issue #7562: Add default config example for ClassTypeParameterName

timeline.message: Issue #7562: Add default config example for ClassTypeParameterName

timeline.bodyText:
use format from

  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/resources/google_checks.xml
    
    
        Lines 212 to 216
      in
      e7277f7
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <module name="ClassTypeParameterName"> 
        

        
          
             <property name="format" value="(^[A-Z][0-9]?)$|([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*[T]$)"/> 
        

        
          
             <message key="name.invalidPattern" 
        

        
          
                    value="Class type name ''{0}'' must match pattern ''{1}''."/> 
        

        
          
           </module>
timeline.bodyHTML:
use format from

checkstyle/src/main/resources/google_checks.xml

Lines 212 to 216 in e7277f7

<module name="ClassTypeParameterName">
<property name="format" value="(^[A-Z][0-9]?)$|([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*[T]$)"/>
<message key="name.invalidPattern"
value="Class type name ''{0}'' must match pattern ''{1}''."/>
</module>
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,22 +39,45 @@ * 
  * <module name="ClassTypeParameterName"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * class MyClass1<T> {}        // OK
+ * class MyClass2<t> {}        // violation
+ * class MyClass3<abc> {}      // violation
+ * class MyClass4<LISTENER> {} // violation
+ * class MyClass5<RequestT> {} // violation
+ *
+ *

+ * To configure the check for names that are uppercase word: + *

+ * 
+ * <module name="ClassTypeParameterName">
+ *   <property name="format" value="^[A-Z]{2,}$"/>
+ * </module>
+ *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * class MyClass1<T> {}        // violation
+ * class MyClass2<t> {}        // violation
+ * class MyClass3<abc> {}      // violation
+ * class MyClass4<LISTENER> {} // OK
+ * class MyClass5<RequestT> {} // violation
+ *
*

- * An example of how to configure the check for names that are only a single - * letter is: + * To configure the check for names that are camel case word with T as suffix: *

- *

Configuration:

* 
  * <module name="ClassTypeParameterName">
- *   <property name="format" value="^[a-zA-Z]$"/>
+ *   <property name="format" value="^[A-Z][a-zA-Z]+T$"/>

timeline.bodyHTML: ... with T as suffix (<href="https://checkstyle.org/styleguides/google-java-style-20180523/javaguide.html#s5.2.8-type-variable-names">Goolge Style</a>)

we ask to generate web site for reason to let us clearly see final rendering.
if you review it yourself, you will see that wording of this like become weird to read, because you missed ( that I suggested.
please do.
